title: 3 BEDROOM HOME FOR LEASE - Up to $750 off upfront
posting_body: SURROUNDED BY NATURAL CREEKS AND SERENE WOODED AREAS.
Newly built 3- and 4-bedroom homes for rent are available now in Conroe!
Brand-new rental homes are pet-friendly and include two-car garage, well-equipped spacious kitchen with pantry, walk-in closets, and washer / dryer connections.
The neighborhood is surrounded by natural creeks and serene wooded areas while still providing easy access to I-45, I-69, and downtown Conroe.

Up to $750 off upfront - Brand New Single-Family Homes - Pet-Friendly - Covered Patios - 2-Car Garage - Walk-in Closets - Spacious Fenced in Backyard - Regular Lawn Maintenance Included - Cable-Ready - Ceiling Fans - Central Air & Heating - Dishwasher & Microwave - Convenient Pantry - Vaulted Ceilings - Washer and Dryer Connections -
Up to $750 off for ASAP Move in
Contact me to schedule your appointment to view these beautiful, new homes
